data.name: DDPara1
data.value: If you have a fixed price tariff and pay by Direct Debit or standing order, for most fixed tariffs you’ll get a discount of £{0} a year for each fuel when compared to other ways of paying. The discount is applied to your standing charge on a pence per day basis, until your tariff ends.

data.name: DDPara2
data.value: If you have a standard variable tariff, your energy prices are capped and the maximum price you pay (known as a cap) is set by Ofgem, the energy regulator. If you pay by Direct Debit or standing order, your standing charge and unit prices will be discounted. Your discount will vary depending on how much energy you use, where you live and your meter type. If you qualified for Warm Home Discount before 1 August 2019, your prices will be discounted regardless of how you pay.

data.name: DDPara3
data.value: Certain tariffs do not qualify for Direct Debit and standing order discounts. Please check the tariff terms and conditions for details.

data.name: FixAndDriveHeading
data.value: Drive for free (with 1 Year Fix and Drive)

data.name: FixAndDriveMessage
data.value: If you sign up to our 1 Year Fix and Drive tariff, you agree to have a compatible (SMETS2) smart meter installed in your property, if you are eligible and don’t already have one. If you have an older smart meter, we’ll need to upgrade your meter so you can benefit from our off-peak rate. We’ll contact you when you’re eligible for your smart meter installation. If we can’t fit a smart meter, we’ll install an Economy 7 meter so you can use our off-peak rate.

data.name: FixAndDrivePara1
data.value: The 1 Year Fix and Drive tariff is available to dual fuel only customers who pay by monthly Direct Debit or quarterly billing only.

data.name: FixAndDrivePara2
data.value: You need to own or lease an electric vehicle that you charge at home. We may ask you to prove this. If you’re unable to, we’ll take you off this tariff and put you onto our Standard Variable Tariff.

data.name: FixAndDrivePara3
data.value: We’ll credit your account for the cost of the electricity you use during the off-peak times of your meter, up to 2,000kWh over the year. We’ll spread this credit over the year and apply it to each quarterly bill. We’ll confirm your meter’s off-peak times in your Welcome pack.

data.name: FixAndDrivePara4
data.value: To reach up to 8,000 miles, we checked the test data for the TESLA Model 3 Standard Range Plus (E1R) with the

data.name: FixAndDrivePara4CarFuelLink
data.value: https://carfueldata.vehicle-certification-agency.gov.uk/search-new-or-used-cars.aspx

data.name: FixAndDrivePara4CarFuelLinkText
data.value: Vehicle Certification Agency

data.name: FixAndDrivePara5
data.value: . We multiplied its electric consumption of 4.0 miles per kWh by the up to 2,000kWh of electricity we’ll include over the year. Your mileage will depend on your car and driving conditions.

data.name: FixAndDriveSummaryHeading
data.value: Drive for free

data.value: Check your heating system is compatible with the Google Nest Thermostat E

data.name: QuoteButtonNextAlt
data.value: Next step to get your energy quote

data.name: SmartHomePackageHeader
data.value: Smart Home Package (with 2 Year Fix and Control)

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage1
data.value: The Smart Home Package, provided by Google, may not be compatible with all heating systems. Please go to the

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage2
data.value: to see if your heating system is compatible before you sign up.

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage3
data.value: The Smart Home Package comes with the 2 Year Fix and Control tariff only. This tariff is available to dual fuel only customers who pay by monthly Direct Debit or quarterly billing only.

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage4
data.value: We’ll send the Smart Home Package to the same address that we supply your energy within 30 working days of your energy application. Someone will need to sign for it.

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage5
data.value: You can install the Smart Home Package yourself. Simply follow the step-by-step

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage5Url
data.value: https://g.co/nest/setupthermostat-e-uk

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage5UrlText
data.value: Nest Thermostat E installation video.

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage5UrlTitle
data.value: How to install the Google Nest Thermostat E

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage7
data.value: If you prefer, we can install it for you for £75. To request an installation, call us on 0345 078 6754 after you sign up.

data.name: SmartHomePackageMessage8
data.value: You’ll need a working internet connection and Wi-Fi to benefit from the Smart Home Package, and we also recommend that you have access to a computer, tablet or smartphone.

data.name: SmartMeter1
data.value: If you sign up to our 2 Year Fix and Control tariff, you agree to have a smart meter installed in your property, if you’re eligible and don’t already have one.
